thread.title: Fantastic customer care
thread.title_full: Fantastic customer care - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 329candyb
title: Fantastic customer care
text: The staff could not have been more welcoming or accommodating. I would highly recommend this hotel. We had a very important appointment the following day - transport was arranged, luggage carefully handled and we were shown the greatest consideration and courteousy by everyone. Really impressive Service.
